welcome_message:
{user}, welcome!
Thank you for joining this server of the study group 972305.

SOME RULES
✅ Be Friendly & Respectful.
✅ Use English only.
✅ No drama.
✅ Have fun!

Please introduce yourself at the text-channel #introduce-yourself with this template:
1️⃣ Full name
2️⃣ How we may call you shortly
3️⃣ Where're you from
4️⃣ What are your interests, hobbies?
5️⃣ Have you ever been to Russia?
6️⃣ Anything you would like to add 🙂
+your photo so everyone can recognize you!
